nodes.title: Federal Reserve System
nodes.short_description: Sets U.S. monetary policy; controls rates and liquidity, stabilizing economy and financial system.

nodes.title: U.S. Congress
nodes.short_description: Writes laws, controls federal spending and taxation, shaping domestic policy and economic priorities.

nodes.title: U.S. Department of the Treasury
nodes.short_description: Manages federal finances, debt issuance, sanctions, and financial oversight affecting markets and geopolitics.

nodes.title: Supreme Court of the United States
nodes.short_description: Interprets Constitution; landmark rulings reshape rights, regulation, elections, and business environments nationwide.

nodes.title: People's Republic of China
nodes.short_description: Primary strategic competitor; trade, technology, military, and geopolitical actions significantly influence U.S. policy.

nodes.title: Energy (Oil & Gas)
nodes.short_description: Prices and supply drive inflation, industrial costs, geopolitics, and national security decisions in the U.S.

nodes.title: Semiconductors
nodes.short_description: Underlying technology for computing, defense, and industry; shortages or advancements ripple across the U.S. economy.

nodes.title: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company
nodes.short_description: Dominant advanced chip foundry; U.S. tech, autos, and defense depend on its capacity and resilience.

nodes.title: Microsoft
nodes.short_description: Core enterprise software and cloud provider; critical cybersecurity and infrastructure for government and businesses.

nodes.title: Amazon
nodes.short_description: E-commerce scale and AWS cloud backbone influence retail, logistics, and digital infrastructure across the U.S.

nodes.title: Lockheed Martin
nodes.short_description: Largest U.S. defense contractor; platforms and supply chains shape defense spending and capabilities.

nodes.title: Mexico
nodes.short_description: Top U.S. goods trade partner; migration, manufacturing, and security cooperation directly affect domestic politics and â€¦

nodes.title: Canada
nodes.short_description: Integrated energy and manufacturing trade; border security and NORAD defense partnership influence U.S. stability.

nodes.title: Saudi Arabia
nodes.short_description: Key swing oil producer; production decisions influence global prices, U.S. inflation, and foreign policy.

nodes.title: COVID-19 pandemic
nodes.short_description: Public health crisis disrupting labor, supply chains, fiscal policy, and Federal Reserve actions in the U.S.
